description.content: Retrieve details of a cart linked to a specific customer using either the customer's ID or a unique cart ID. It offers an overview of the items, quantities, prices, and other relevant information associated with the cart.

query.description: The unique identifier of the cart
This is a boolean value. Select `true` to retrieve all the items added in the cart.
This is a boolean value. Select `true` to retrieve the price breakup of cart items.
This is a boolean value. Select `true` to retrieve the cod charges in breakup of cart items.
Token of user's debit or credit card
Customer servicable area_code
This is a boolen value. Select `true` to set/initialize buy now cart

response.name: Success. Returns a Cart object. Check the example shown below or refer `CartDetailResponse` for more details.

request.name: getCartLastModified | Get last modified timestamp of a cart

response.name: Success. Receives last modifed timestamp in the header.
